channel.title: Adding npc drops - read and reply please!-
channel.description:
I am trying to add npc drops, I have tried it in "Npcdrops.cfg" I did it all right, however it won't drop. I heard that most servers load up the npc drops in a different file. Which file is this? If you can please tell me how to make the drops. All I am really asking for is what file its located in.
If it is in a .class file, please tell me what program to open it with. Thank you!

item.title: Adding npc drops - read and reply please!-
item.dc:creator: @99range_k0 99range k0
item.description:
@99range_k0 wrote:

Thank you very much deaths chaos!!

Read full topic
item.source: Adding npc drops - read and reply please!-

item.title: Adding npc drops - read and reply please!-
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

Drops are loaded in NPCHandler.java
To add a drop add a line like this, fill in the words with the correct numbers

npcdrop = NPCID ITEMID AMOUNT FREQUENCY(%)

I highly suggest you commit that to memory and do not copy and paste into your cfg file as I used spaces not the tab bar.

Read full topic
item.source: Adding npc drops - read and reply please!-
